name: Exocraft
description: Design unique spaceships and build the ultimate space mining fleet as you team up to battle for resources and glory in this massively multiplayer action strategy set in an alien wasteland.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7+, 32-bit Processor: 1 GHz Equivalent CPU Memory: 1 GB RAM Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 150 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 10, 64-bit Processor: 2 GHz Equivalent CPU Memory: 2 GB RAM Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 150 MB available space
